context: I'm great thanks for asking. How are you? Oh great!
Have you seen Deadpool (2016) or the new Deadpool 2 (2018) Both hilarious and lots of comedy
I seen the new one but not the old one I loved it though Have you seen Vacation (2015)
I'd say any Marvel movie would be good like The Avengers (2012) or the new Avengers: Infinity War (2018) No I haven't but I heard of it a few times, I'll have to add it to my list.
resp: Avengers: Infinity War (2018) was awesome have you seen Black Panther (2018)
